scripts.test:debug: cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug npx bddgen && cross-env LOG_LEVEL=debug npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:ui-chrome: cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx playwright test --project=ui-chromium
scripts.test:ui-firefox: cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx playwright test --project=ui-firefox
scripts.test:ui-safari: cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx playwright test --project=ui-webkit
scripts.test:ui-all: cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx playwright test --project=ui-chromium --project=ui-firefox --project=ui-webkit
scripts.test:api: cross-env TEST_TYPE=API npx bddgen && cross-env TEST_TYPE=API npx playwright test --project=api
scripts.test:parallel: npx bddgen && concurrently "cross-env TEST_TYPE=UI npx playwright test --project=ui-chromium --project=ui-firefox --project=ui-webkit" "cross-env TEST_TYPE=API npx playwright test --project=api"
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:clean-run: npm run allure:clean && npm run test:parallel && npm run allure:report
